tool_description: An API that shows top movies and tv shows
name: Movie and TV show API
title: Movie and TV show API

api_list.name: Get Show By Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-and-tv-show-api.p.rapidapi.com/show/Better Call Saul"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-and-tv-show-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
